case_title: Major Riaz Ahmad Rashid and others vs The State and others
appellant: Major Riaz Ahmad Rashid and others

legal_issues.issue: Claim by Ghulam Muhammad and Janat Khatoon that Khasra No. 837 was allotted to their father Fazal Karim.
legal_issues.decision: Resumed as evacuee land in favor of Provincial Government.

legal_issues.issue: Jurisdiction of Deputy Commissioner/District Collector post-repeal of Settlement Laws in 1974.
legal_issues.law: Evacuee Property and Displaced Persons Laws (Repeal) Act, 1975

appellant_arguments: Ownership confirmed in Register of Rights for 1967-68.
Transactions were registered and incorporated in Revenue Records.
Settlement Laws repealed in 1974; case cannot be reopened.
respondent_arguments: Khasra No. 837 was allotted to Fazal Karim against verified claim.
Fraudulent entries made in Register Haqdaran for 1967-68.
District Collector deprived petitioners of land on extraneous grounds.

judgment.decision: Petition of Major Riaz Ahmad Rashid accepted; Revision Petition of Ghulam Muhammad dismissed.
reasoning: Ownership confirmed through registered deeds and Revenue Records.
No fraud detected in transactions from 1967 to 1985.
District Collector lacked jurisdiction post-repeal of Settlement Laws.
